newsDetail.title: New Open Data Platform Launched in Kazakhstan
newsDetail.author: Alexander Petrov
newsDetail.info: The Ministry of Digital Development of Kazakhstan has announced the launch of an updated open data platform designed to enhance government transparency and provide easier access to information for citizens.
newsDetail.blueText: Main Advantages of the New Platform
newsDetail.quote: "Open data is a key element of the digital transformation of public administration and the development of Kazakhstan's digital economy"
newsDetail.moreInfo: The platform provides access to over 10,000 datasets from various government agencies, including statistical information, budget data, government procurement information, and much more.
